title: Lemon & Garlic Chicken with Chickpeas — Foodie Fuel
method: Heat olive oil in a wide pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and spices and cook gently until fragrant.
Add the chicken breast and cook until coloured and just cooked through (12–20 minutes depending on cut).
Fold through chickpeas or lentils and warm gently.
Finish with lemon juice and fresh herbs.
plating: Serve in a shallow bowl, protein centred with pulses around, finished with herbs and olive oil.
swaps: Swap pulses seasonally or use broad beans.
